definition: to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: From 2002, Hospitals Include Sanatoriums and Tend and Protect Hospitals.
sentences.chinese: 从2002年起医院数中包括疗养院和护理院。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the advantage of natural convalescent factors of Xingcheng Sanatorium.
sentences.chinese: 目的调查兴城疗养院区自然疗养因子的优势。

sentences.english: Care centers compared to Lacombe, nursing "homes" and other places in Louisiana.
sentences.chinese: 比较拉科姆护理中心，疗养院等地方在路易斯安那州。

sentences.english: She spent three years in a sanatorium, returning just as I went to university.
sentences.chinese: 她在疗养院住了三年，回来时正赶上我上大学。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the method of combination of recuperation and treatment and improve the comprehensive strength of sanitariums .
sentences.chinese: 目的探索疗治结合的方法，提高疗养院的综合实力。

sentences.english: The country health agency has dedicated one inspector to monitor conditions in nursing homes.
sentences.chinese: 该国卫生机构已指定一名检查员监测各疗养院的情况。

sentences.english: He's a patient at Oak Valley Nursing Home.
sentences.chinese: 他是橡谷疗养院的一个病人。

sentences.english: Residents of nursing homes and other chronic-care facilities.
sentences.chinese: 在疗养院和在其他慢性病治疗机构中居住的人员。

sentences.english: From 2003, Hospitals excluded Sanatoriums and Tend and Protect Hospitals.
sentences.chinese: 从2003年起医院数中不包括疗养院。

sentences.english: Professional hospitals are all filled up, and private nursing homes don’t have qualified people.
sentences.chinese: 专科医院满额了，私人疗养院又没有合格的专业人员。
疗养院里九十多岁的居民。

sentences.english: Every good mountain with an enclosing gesture is a sanatorium.
sentences.chinese: 每座作围绕之状的佳山都是疗养院。

sentences.english: Results The Morita therapy was very useful in the sanatorium if the aforementioned means were employed.
sentences.chinese: 结果如按上述方法，森田疗法在疗养院大有用武之地。

sentences.english: Molkenkur and Nussloch are in completely opposite directions.
sentences.chinese: 摩尔根疗养院和胡桃胡同是完全相反的方向。

sentences.english: Many mutual-aid societies branched out and founded their own hospitals and sanitariums.
sentences.chinese: 许多互助会社还创办自己的医院和疗养院。

sentences.english: After, also came to Meng Fu nursing homes.
sentences.chinese: 之后，亦名来到孟父的疗养院。

definition: to get well/to heal/to recuperate/to convalesce/convalescence/to nurse
